comments.body: Please follow-up on this [request]( https://github.com/digitalemagine/py-statistics/issues/2#issuecomment-285830188 ) to get the license file included in the `sdist` on PyPI. On the next release when the license file is included, please add `license_file: LICENSE` to this section. Thanks.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +31,35 @@  home: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/statistics
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_family: Apache
  summary: 'A Python 2.* port of 3.4 Statistics Module'
  description: |
